tvmega_recap: Marah, Marina, and Michelle question their loved ones about Maryann Caruthers. Josh, Buzz, and Ed deny knowing her. Buzz, Josh, Ed, and Billy meet at Company and Billy says no one but them and Alan knows what happened to Maryann. Carrie appears to get the girls results and allows them to know that Maryann Caruthers is dead. Lizzie, Beth and Lillian are out together. Lizzie realizes that they are keeping her from Philip's intervention. At the intervention Philip is paranoid and delusional. Philip agress to check into a hospital. Philip and Lizzie agree to get well together. Olivia returns to town!!! --
